alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 2:29PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...AND ALLEGANY COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 228 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Ripley to near Olean and moving east at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Jamestown, Olean, Salamanca, Allegany State Park, Westfield, Lakewood, Falconer, Allegany, Mayville, Long Point State Park, Jamestown West, Weston Mills, Frewsburg, St. Bonaventure, Chautauqua Institution, Findley Lake, Chautauqua, Ripley, Stockton and Hinsdale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 61 and 60. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 27. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
